snippet.title: HANGAR 8 - STEAM Wishlist Trailer (New Horror Game Releasing 1st October 2024)
snippet.description:
A psychological horror game set within the unsettling confines of a derelict space station. Brave the looping corridors, discover all anomalies, collect key items, and escape the nightmare!

WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3204650/HANGAR_8/

The STEAM release on 1st October 2024 will have 8 new anomalies, an extra logbook to find, and more achievements to unlock!

You can also get the game from itch.io from the 13th of September 2024:
https://twintaildigital.itch.io/hangar8

Blending anomaly spotting mechanics from games such as "The Exit 8" and "I'm on Observation Duty", with the liminal-space psychological horror of "The Backrooms", HANGAR 8 challenges both your memory and your sanity.

#horrorgaming #games #trailer #hangar8 #scarygaming #spooky #anomaly #gametrailers #itchio #pcgaming
